example:
() => (
  <Stack direction="column">
    <Stack direction="column">
      <Heading type="title3" as="h3">
        Small
      </Heading>
      <RatingStars rating={3} showEmpty />
    </Stack>
    <Stack direction="column">
      <Heading type="title3" as="h3">
        Medium
      </Heading>
      <RatingStars size="medium" rating={3} showEmpty />
    </Stack>
    <Stack direction="column">
      <Heading type="title3" as="h3">
        Large
      </Heading>
      <RatingStars size="large" rating={3} showEmpty />
    </Stack>
  </Stack>
)

info.title: Sizes
info.description: The stars can be small (the default), medium, or large.
